column4: does any think its better to go with a 32 bit distro even though i have 64 just 4 more drivers and compatability?
I run 64-bit and have had no problems whatsoever with drivers

The only things "missing" are native 64-bit Java and Flash plugins for browsers, and both of those are being worked on (Adobe has a 64-bit Flash in alpha, and Java 7 is expected to have a 64-bit plugin)
I can't remember the last time I needed to run a Java applet, though
